languages.text: "Брехня! Слыхал я эту байку для дураков. Так{rt_mf|ой|ая} же дворян{rt_mf|ин|ка}, как прочие — только поважнее. Всех вокруг за грязь считает и помыкает похуже, чем наши... ну так оно и верно — так Бог-Император распорядился, что им место — наверху, а нам — в пыли, так мир устроен... Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа}, гляди, и вообще скоро тут все себе приберет". {n}Пузатый мужчина проводит пальцем под носом, и в грязи на его лице остается борозда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Брехня! Слыхал я эту байку для дураков. Так{mf|ой|ая} же аристократ{mf||ка} как прочие — только поважнее. Нос задрал{mf||а} и ходит, как будто все тут {mf|евоное|ееное}. Ну так оно и положено, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} все-таки. Того гляди — и правда тут все себе приберет". {n}Пузатый мужчина проводит пальцем под носом, и в грязи на его лице остается борозда.{/n}

languages.text: "Rubbish! I've heard that tale before, and only an idiot would believe it. {rt_mf|He|She}'s a noble{rt_mf|man|woman} like any other, just a more important one. Treats everyone like dirt and pushes people around worse than any of our own nobles do... But that's the way it is, isn't it. It's the God-Emperor's will that their place be at the top and ours in the dust. It's how the world works... Next thing you know, that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} will make this whole place {rt_mf|his|her} own." {n}The pot-bellied man runs a finger under his nose, leaving a clean patch on his grimy face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Брехня! Слыхал я эту байку для дураков. Так{rt_mf|ой|ая} же дворян{rt_mf|ин|ка}, как прочие — только поважнее. Всех вокруг за грязь считает и помыкает похуже, чем наши... ну так оно и верно — так Бог-Император распорядился, что им место — наверху, а нам — в пыли, так мир устроен... Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа}, гляди, и вообще скоро тут все себе приберет". {n}Пузатый мужчина проводит пальцем под носом, и в грязи на его лице остается борозда.{/n}

Treats everyone like dirt and pushes people around worse than any of our own nobles do... But that's the way it is, isn't it. Next thing you know, that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} will make this whole place {rt_mf|his|her} own." {n}The pot-bellied man runs a finger under his nose, leaving a clean patch on his grimy face.{/n}

languages.text: “胡说八道！这种鬼话我以前也听过，但只有蠢货才会当真。{rt_mf|他|她}不过是个贵族，和别的贵族没什么区别，只是比其他人地位更高而已。{rt_mf|他|她}把所有人都当垃圾一样对待，对所有人呼来喝去，比我们自己的贵族还差劲……但规矩就是这样，是吧？这就是神皇的旨意。他们站在图腾柱的顶点，而我们埋在泥巴里，这个世界就是这么运转的……恐怕用不了多久，那位来自上界的大人便会宣布这个地方归{rt_mf|他|她}所有。”{n}这个大腹便便的男人搓着鼻子，脏污的脸上留下了一个白块。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! I've heard that tale before, and only an idiot would believe it. {rt_mf|He|She}'s a noble{rt_mf|man|woman} like any other, just a more important one. Treats everyone like dirt and pushes people around worse than any of our own nobles do... But that's the way it is, isn't it. It's the God-Emperor's will that their place be at the top and ours in the dust. It's how the world works... Next thing you know, that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} will make this whole place {rt_mf|his|her} own." {n}The pot-bellied man runs a finger under his nose, leaving a clean patch on his grimy face.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Tonterías! He oído antes esa historia y hay que ser memo para creérsela. Es otr{rt_mf|o|a} noble más, pero más importante. Trata a los demás como escoria y mangonea a la gente más que nuestros propios nobles... Pero así son las cosas, ¿no? Es la voluntad del Dios Emperador que ellos estén arriba y nosotros en el polvo. Así funciona el mundo... Ya veréis cómo {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} acaba por adueñarse de todo esto». {n}El orondo hombre se frota bajo la nariz, dejando una zona limpia en su mugrienta cara.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! I've heard that tale before, and only an idiot would believe it. {rt_mf|He|She}'s a noble{rt_mf|man|woman} like any other, just a more important one. Next thing you know, that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} will make this whole place {rt_mf|his|her} own." {n}The pot-bellied man runs a finger under his nose, leaving a clean patch on his grimy face.{/n}

Así funciona el mundo... Ya veréis cómo {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} acaba por adueñarse de todo esto». {n}El orondo hombre se frota bajo la nariz, dejando una zona limpia en su mugrienta cara.{/n}

languages.text: "Saçmalık! Bu masalı daha önce de duymuştum. Ancak bir aptal buna inanır. O da diğerleri gibi bir soylu, sadece daha önemli biri. Herkese pislik muamelesi yapıyor ve insanlarımızı bizim kendi soylularımızdan bile daha feci itip kakıyor... Ama düzen bu, değil mi? Onların yerinin tepede, bizimkinin ise tozda olması Tanrı İmparator'un iradesi. Düzen böyle işliyor... Bir bakmışsın o Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} burayı kendi malı yapmış." {n}Göbekli adam, parmağını burnunun altında gezdirip kirli yüzünde temiz bir iz bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! I've heard that tale before, and only an idiot would believe it. {rt_mf|He|She}'s a noble{rt_mf|man|woman} like any other, just a more important one. Treats everyone like dirt and pushes people around worse than any of our own nobles do... But that's the way it is, isn't it. It's the God-Emperor's will that their place be at the top and ours in the dust. It's how the world works... Next thing you know, that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} will make this whole place {rt_mf|his|her} own." {n}The pot-bellied man runs a finger under his nose, leaving a clean patch on his grimy face.{/n}

languages.text: 「くだらねぇ！俺は前にもそんな話聞いたぞ。馬鹿だけがそんな話を信じるんだ。天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は、他の高貴な{rt_mf|旦那|奥様}と同じようなもので、もっと位が高いだけだ。みんなを汚物のように扱い、地元の貴族よりももっとひどい方法で人々をこき使うんだ…しかし、それが現実ってもんだろ。そうじゃねぇか？それが神帝陛下の意志であり、彼が頂上にいて、俺たちは平身低頭する。それが世の中の仕組みってやつさ…次にお前が知ることは、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}がこの場所全部を自分のものにしちまうことさ」{n}太鼓腹の男は鼻の下に指を走らせると、その垢まみれの顔にきれいになった跡がつく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! I've heard that tale before, and only an idiot would believe it. {rt_mf|He|She}'s a noble{rt_mf|man|woman} like any other, just a more important one. It's the God-Emperor's will that their place be at the top and ours in the dust. It's how the world works... Next thing you know, that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} will make this whole place {rt_mf|his|her} own." {n}The pot-bellied man runs a finger under his nose, leaving a clean patch on his grimy face.{/n}

languages.text: « Foutaises ! J'ai déjà entendu ces sornettes, et il faut être bête comme ses pieds pour y croire. Ce n'est qu'{rt_mf|un homme|une femme} comme les autres, juste avec un statut plus important que la moyenne. {rt_mf|Il|Elle} traite tout le monde avec mépris et est encore plus {rt_mf|infect|infecte} que nos propres nobles... Mais bon, c'est comme ça. Telle est la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu. Leur place est au sommet, et la nôtre est dans la boue. Ainsi va le monde... Pour ce qu'on en sait, {rt_mf|ce Seigneur|cette Seigneure} Céleste pourrait très bien s'emparer de notre monde. »{n}L'homme bedonnant se passe un doigt sous le nez, laissant une trace presque propre sur son visage autrement crasseux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Rubbish! I've heard that tale before, and only an idiot would believe it. {rt_mf|He|She}'s a noble{rt_mf|man|woman} like any other, just a more important one. Treats everyone like dirt and pushes people around worse than any of our own nobles do... But that's the way it is, isn't it. It's the God-Emperor's will that their place be at the top and ours in the dust. It's how the world works... Next thing you know, that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} will make this whole place {rt_mf|his|her} own." {n}The pot-bellied man runs a finger under his nose, leaving a clean patch on his grimy face.{/n}

Ce n'est qu'{rt_mf|un homme|une femme} comme les autres, juste avec un statut plus important que la moyenne. {rt_mf|Il|Elle} traite tout le monde avec mépris et est encore plus {rt_mf|infect|infecte} que nos propres nobles... Mais bon, c'est comme ça. Telle est la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu. Leur place est au sommet, et la nôtre est dans la boue. Ainsi va le monde... Pour ce qu'on en sait, {rt_mf|ce Seigneur|cette Seigneure} Céleste pourrait très bien s'emparer de notre monde. »{n}L'homme bedonnant se passe un doigt sous le nez, laissant une trace presque propre sur son visage autrement crasseux.{/n}

languages.text: "Unsinn! Die Geschichte habe ich schon einmal gehört, und nur ein Narr würde sie glauben. {rt_mf|Er ist ein ganz gewöhnlicher Adeliger|Sie ist eine ganz gewöhnliche Adelige}, nur eben ein bisschen wichtiger. Behandelt jeden wie Dreck und schubst Leute herum, noch viel schlimmer als unsere eigenen Adeligen es tun ... Aber so ist das eben einfach, nicht wahr? Es ist der Wille des Gottimperators, dass sie ganz oben stehen und wir im Staub liegen. So funktioniert die Welt nun mal ... Und bald wird {rt_mf|dieser himmlische Herr|diese himmlische Herrin} sich hier alles einverleiben." {n}Der dickbäuchige Mann reibt sich mit dem Finger unter der Nase, was einen sauberen Streifen auf seinem schmutzigen Gesicht hinterlässt.{/n}
